short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fine tune your steam item price by looking at actual listings and not at the cluttered graph (you can switch back to graph)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fine tune your steam item price by looking at actual listings and not at the cluttered graph of past sales (you can switch back to graph at any time)
